ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019REITs are quite affordable and good for beginner investors who are stuggling with good capital for investment. At present 38 REITs are listed on the Singapore stock market. They can be subdivided into these sectors: office, retail, industrial, hospitality and healthcare.If you are looking to invest in REIT industry safely, you can look for industrial or office REITS. Hospitality and Retail sectors are next.
